education.area: IT Automation with Python Professional Certificate

highlights: Worked with PM on implementation of DEVOPS & Agile workflows
Implementation of new CI/CD pipelines with microservices
Migrated existing bare-metal architecture to Docker using CI/CD pipelines
Code reviews and merge requests
Creating new game features that included everything from jQuery frontends to custom Python anomaly detection algorithms that analyze player data in MongoDB
Currently working on migrating microservices to Google Kubernetes Engine

Created a Google Cloud hosted, fully autonomous, UAV land surveying platform that is able to compete with the accuracy of traditional ground surveying equipment. Platform was created with a containerized Python backend and JS Web UI.
Worked with GIS software and dimensionality reduction algorithms to automate drafting/CAD tasks.
Responsible for the administration of the domain, network, and servers at the company's Honolulu and Pearl City offices
Created a platform that allowed engineers to input images and roof inspection data and then used reinforcement learning to continuously predict the validity of insurance claims
Worked with IaaS in AWS, Azure, GCP, Digital Ocean, and IBM Cloud to implement thin-client architectures
Microsoft AD domain configuration, network engineering, server management, hardware diagnostics, backup configuration, and security implementations.
Specialized in high-availability server environments using Hyper-V replication between sites, Microsoft Azure, and clustering of VMs.
Responsible for engineering and troubleshooting the infrastructure of 12 medium-sized client businesses.
Worked as a sole-proprietor for several small-sized businesses to create and implement IT solutions.
Performed CMS/Web development, security audits, vehicle automation, networking, custom workstation and server builds.
Worked in an ISO Class 5 clean room to perform data recovery on standard HDDs.
Worked with the PC-3000 and DeepSpar Disk Imager to recovery data from failing HDDs and SSDs with corrupted firmware.
Authored a simple, UNIX-based application to perform low-level disk imaging for logically corrupted drives that do not have overly critical hardware failures.
Worked with small-businesses and individual customers to provide networking services, custom PC and server hardware, and casual web design.
Repaired and manufactured mobile LCD screens.
Developed software that allowed technicians to recover deleted data from Android devices with NAND storage.
Component level PCB repair on personal electronics. Created BGA temperature profiles for re-flowing surface mount GPU and CPU through iteration.

awards.summary: A challenge-based exercise designed to present an environment that tests participants knowledge of cybersecurity related concepts, tools and techniques.

awards.title: FBI Infraguard Member
awards.summary: A partnership between the FBI and members of the private sector for the protection of U.S. Critical Infrastructure.
